import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Modal, Button, DropdownButton, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; export class Header extends Component { state = { aboutShown: false } showAbout = (shown) => { this.setState({ aboutShown: shown }) } render() { return ( <>

Activities in Sydney

#AustraliaLockdown

Australia New South Wales Victoria
Activities in Sydney #AustraliaLockdown

This map shows popular activities in Sydney during #LockdownAustralia based on Twitter data.

This application is developed for Cluster and Cloud Computing assigment 2 Semester 1 2020 by

 ) } } export default Header;
